parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The application name. The value of this parameter must be the same as the application name that is specified in the ingest URL. Otherwise, the configuration does not take effect. The name can be up to 255 characters in length and can contain digits, letters, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). The name cannot start with a hyphen (-) or underscore (\_). You can also specify an asterisk (\*) as the value to match all applications.

parameters.name: IgnoreTranscode
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to ignore the transcoded stream. Valid values:

*   **true** (default)
*   **false**

parameters.name: PartDuration
parameters.description:
The part length. Unit: milliseconds.

>  This parameter is required if Protocol is set to LLHLS_TS or LLHLS_CMAF.

*   If the value of SegmentDuration is 1, the valid values of this parameter are 100 to 500.
*   If the value of SegmentDuration is 2, the valid values of this parameter are 100 to 1000.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
The streaming protocol and encapsulation format. Valid values:

*   **HLS_CMAF**
*   **LLHLS_TS** (low latency)
*   **LLHLS_CMAF** (low latency)
*   **DASH_CMAF**
*   **HLSDASH_CMAF**

parameters.name: SegmentDuration
parameters.description:
The segment length. Unit: seconds.

*   If Protocol is set to HLS_CMAF, the valid values of this parameter are 1 to 10.
*   If Protocol is set to LLHLS_TS or LLHLS_CMAF, the valid values of this parameter are 1 to 2.

parameters.name: SegmentNum
parameters.description: The number of segments. Valid values: 3 to 10.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The stream name. The value of this parameter must be the same as the stream name that is specified in the ingest URL. Otherwise, the configuration does not take effect. The name can be up to 255 characters in length and can contain digits, letters, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). The name cannot start with a hyphen (-) or underscore (\_). You can also specify an asterisk (\*) as the value to match all streams.
